message.content:
cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DS

This paper is about improving keyword recommendations in sponsored search, which is a subfield of information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also uses deep reinforcement learning (RL) to solve the combinatorial optimization problem of selecting the best keywords, which falls under the subfields of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI). Hence, cs.LG and cs.AI are also likely sub-categories. The paper also involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques to analyze the relevance of keywords, which is a subfield of computational linguistics (CL). Therefore, cs.CL is another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper proposes a pre-clustering method to reduce the action space, which is a technique commonly used in data science (DS). Hence, cs.DS is another possible sub-category.
